products.TOOL-NAME: MACAU by VTT
products.FOCUS: WP2 - MODEL QUALITY
products.DESCRIPTION: MACAU is a wrapper class for state-of-the-art tree-based LightGBM algorithm which enables adding both aleatoric and epistemic uncertainty via a proxy to LightGBM. MACAU is based on tree-introspection accompanied with proxy models for uncertainty modelling. Additionally, MACAU enables adding additional non-linearities to the model which enables the model to capture smooth non-linearities better than vanilla RF.
products.INTEGRATION: THE ARTIFACT CAN BE IMPORTED AS A LIBRARY/PACKAGE IN ANY IDE OR CAN BE WRAPPED TO BE USED
products.brand: WP2 - MODEL QUALITY

products.TOOL-NAME: Synthetic MRI data by VTT and PHILIPS
products.FOCUS: WP2 - DATA QUALITY
products.DESCRIPTION: This tool is used to generate synthetic T1-weighted brain MR images. The tool overcomes privacy and availability issues with real data, by generating synthetic data that can be used in its place.
